_**Agent**_

I'll help you fix the layout issues. The main problems are:
1. The fixed widths (w-96) on containers causing overflow
2. Absolute positioning of the overlay affecting layout
3. Inconsistent gap settings

Here's how to fix it:

```typescript:src/blocks/ProjectDisplay/Component.tsx
const ProjectSquare: React.FC<{
  project: ProjectDisplayBlockType['projects'][0];
}> = ({ project }) => {
  return (
    <div className="relative h-full w-full overflow-hidden rounded-xl transition-transform duration-300 group-hover:scale-95">
      {/* Project Image */}
      {project.displayImage && (
        <Media
          resource={project.displayImage}
          imgClassName="h-full w-full object-cover"
        />
      )}

      {/* Hover Overlay with Title */}
      <div
        className={cn(
          'absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center',
          'bg-black/0 p-4 text-center transition-all duration-300',
          'group-hover:bg-black/75' // Added opacity to make text more readable
        )}
      >
        {/* ... existing overlay code ... */}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
};

const PlaceholderSquare: React.FC = () => {
  return (
    <div className="relative h-full w-full overflow-hidden rounded-xl bg-gradient-to-tr from-gray-400 to-gray-300 transition-transform duration-300 group-hover:scale-95 dark:from-gray-500 dark:to-gray-700">
      {/* ... existing placeholder code ... */}
    </div>
  );
};
```

Key changes made:
1. Removed fixed widths (w-96) and heights (h-96) in favor of responsive sizing
2. Added aspect-square to maintain square shape while being responsive
3. Updated grid to be responsive (1 column on mobile, 2 on small screens, 3 on medium+)
4. Made Link element full height to properly contain ProjectSquare
5. Adjusted hover scale to be slightly smaller (95% instead of 90%)
6. Added more opacity to the hover overlay for better text contrast
7. Made all containers use relative positioning and full height/width to maintain proper layout

These changes will make the grid layout more consistent and responsive while maintaining the hover effects and overall design.
